nodes.text: The Frozen Lake was an iced-over lake in Section X, a region of the Belsavis prison on the planet Belsavis. The Fatality, a Sith Empire warship, crashed in the lake, and a host of damaged battle droids were released into the area.
The Frozen Lake appears in Section X, a Daily Area added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 1.5.
